starless.name: Riley drowning
starless.description: a digital painting of Riley experiencing a nightmare of drowning

starless.name: riley meditating
starless.description: a drawing of Riley learning to use magic, which they channel by meditating to music

starless.name: Riley after battle
starless.description: a digital drawing of Riley a little beat up after fighting a monster

starless.name: Riley and Leah
starless.description: a close crop of Riley and Leah laying down together

starless.name: Riley and Leah
starless.description: Riley and Leah laying down together

starless.name: Riley and Leah at Pride 2020
starless.description: a digital drawing of Riley and Leah at Pride, Leah has a lesbian flag and a pride flag tank top. Riley has a nonbinary bandana.

starless.name: Riley gets a sword!
starless.description: a doodle i did in my session notes when Riley first got their sword

dreamscape.name: an iconic duo
dreamscape.description: Aster and Ashe hugging, really displaying how much smaller Ashe is

dreamscape.name: walkthing through static
dreamscape.description: an early painting of Aster walking through the dreamscape

dreamscape.name: Aster at the beach house
dreamscape.description: a digital drawing of Aster in their bathing suit, enjoying the beginning of summer vacation before things go horribly wrong

dreamscape.name: Ashe concept art
dreamscape.description: some initial drawings of Ashe to get a better feel for drawing them

dreamscape.name: twins?
dreamscape.description: a quick sketch of a moment in one of the sessions where Amy is pulled into the dreamscape and meets Andie for the first time

dreamscape.name: fancy twins
dreamscape.description: Aster and Andie dressed up for a formal event, looking sharp as ever

dreamscape.name: San Diego summertime
dreamscape.description: a scene from childhood, young Aster and Andie running with a kite

dreamscape.name: separated, but close
dreamscape.description: an older drawing of Aster and Andie reaching towards portals in their respective dimensions

dreamscape.name: twins through time
dreamscape.description: three drawings of Aster and Andie as they grew, first as kids, then as teens, right before Andie falls through the portal, then as adults where they are now in the story

dreamscape.name: Aster and Ashe in a different style
dreamscape.description: a style experiment with Aster and Ashe

dreamscape.name: through the nightmares
dreamscape.description: Ashe comforting Aster after one of their terrible nightmares

dreamscape.name: Aster & Ashe doodles
dreamscape.description: a sketch page of Aster and Ashe moments. visiting the local indie bookstore, reading with their cats, and trying on each other's clothes

dreamscape.name: Ashe needs a haircut
dreamscape.description: a soft moment in the daily lives of Aster and Ashe, where Aster shaves the back of Ashe's head while they sit in the bathtub

dreamscape.name: Aster is too tall
dreamscape.description: Ashe tries (and succeeds, mostly) in giving Aster a piggy back ride

dreamscape.name: matching sweaters
dreamscape.description: a cuddly Aster and Ashe wearing matching sweaters in their respective colors

dreamscape.name: wedding day
dreamscape.description: inspired by a picture from Molly Ostertag and Noelle Stevenson's wedding. Ashe feeding Aster some frosting from their wedding cake on their (eventual) wedding day. Aster has flowers in their hair in the colors of some of the most people in their life (and also pansexual pride colors!). Ashe has a cape and that's beautiful.

dreamscape.name: wintertime adventures
dreamscape.description: Aster and Ashe all bundled up for the cold Chicago winter. inspired by a scene from the Happiest Season trailer. Aster is wearing the handmade scarf that Ashe gave them for their birthday

dreamscape.name: christmas card
dreamscape.description: a drawing of Aster and Ashe's Christmas card from 2020. here's the flavor text: 'Merry Christmas from Aster, Ashe, Kepler (small and grey), and Carl (large and orange)! It’s been a long year. Ashe graduated, Aster survived lots of TA-ing, and both Kepler and Carl were rescued. There was lots of late night studying and plenty of coffee to go around. Despite some rough patches and a few injuries, we’re looking forward to a happy, healthy 2021!'

dreamscape.name: Aster is a dad
dreamscape.description: inspired by a joke that Amy has accidentally called Aster dad. Aster in cargo shorts, high socks, and wearing earbuds. Ashe is terribly embarrassed by their idiot.

dreamscape.name: sketch page
dreamscape.description: a sketch page, featuring a tender moment of Aster and Ashe coexisting on their bed before going to sleep for the night, Ashe bestowing a forehead kiss to Aster, and Andie and Aster posing for a birthday photo in the dreamscape. this was their first birthday together in over a decade, but it was bittersweet, since Andie couldn't come back to the real world with them.

dreamscape.name: Aster fashion show
dreamscape.description: an early drawing of Aster in some nice fashion from Pinterest, before i decided they have very little sense of fashion and wear the same shirt every day.

dreamscape.name: Aster outfit reel
dreamscape.description: Aster in a couple of outfits/variations of outfits. never quite finished this, but the idea is there

dreamscape.name: the Chung family
dreamscape.description: Aster, Andie, and their mom and dad. a family photo after Andie is reunited with her parents.

dreamscape.name: Aster, Amy, and Alan on Christmas
dreamscape.description: a picture of Aster, Amy, and Alan celebrating Christmas together

dreamscape.name: the gang's all here
dreamscape.description: well, not quite. the core 6 of raid party. team bonk'n'conk, as we call them. from L to R, Karina, Alan, Amy, Aster, Ashe, and Gary.

dreamscape.name: got you flowers (with words left unsaid)
dreamscape.description: an emotional piece, placed outside of canon, where Aster has upset Ashe and returns after a fight to give them flowers and apologize. this was a super experimental piece and i'm really happy with how it turned out

dreamscape.name: sleepy heads
dreamscape.description: Aster and Ashe, fallen asleep on the floor during a evening hangout with Andie and Rachel. they do this more than they should.

sky-high.name: Taika ref sheet
sky-high.description: a reference sheet for Taika, created in preparation for Art Fight 2021

sky-high.name: Taika is a bit of a crybaby
sky-high.description: high school is hard, and then adding training to be a superhero and your dad being a supervillain on top of that? that's a lot, it makes sense to cry

sky-high.name: Taika is feeling very small
sky-high.description: a drawing of a moment that happened in session. Taika's team had just been nearly beaten, and she was the last one standing, or, uh falling from a skyscraper. she was caught by Tess, and then brought back to the top of the building with Tess, Fabian, and the three adult Knights staring at her disapprovingly.

sky-high.name: skitchin'
sky-high.description: Taika is a skateboarder, so she needs the threads to look the part.

sky-high.name: Nguyen family photo
sky-high.description: a family photo with Fabian, Taika, and Tess. they look almost like a normal family! note: everyone is wearing at least a bit of red as per Fabian photo requirements

sky-high.name: it's a good thing you're cute
sky-high.description: Taika is a sweater stealer, even before she and Rhea get together, but it's more okay once Rhea can say this back.

sky-high.name: uwu
sky-high.description: i found a cool pose reference on twitter, and these fools are adorable and romantic. they're either about to kiss, or Taika is gonna fall off the table, your choice.

sky-high.name: Fabian ref sheet
sky-high.description: a ref sheet for Fabian. i was trying to get a better feel for them, since my design for them kept changing. i also wanted to get their villain costume solidified, but i'm still not so sure about this design. they need to look more cool.

sky-high.name: Taika is adorable
sky-high.description: a smiley Taika to bring joy to your day. i think she just won a fight.

sky-high.name: they're heroes and they're holding hands
sky-high.description: i mean, look at them, they're doing so well. this was inspired by me wanting to solidify both Taika's second costume and Rhea's costume. i thought it would be nice to draw them together, so i did. Taika is probably a little too tall here, she should be a solid half foot shorter than Rhea.

sky-high.name: Nguyen Family Bread
sky-high.description: an old family photo of the Nguyens at the farmer's market. these are Fabian, David, and Tess's old designs, but i still like the piece a lot. good memories. Fabian keeps this one framed on their desk.

sky-high.name: sparring
sky-high.description: an early sketch i did when i we decided that Rhea and Taika would be rivals to lovers and that they'd spar together. the tension is PRESENT and i love it.

sky-high.name: young Fabian
sky-high.description: an early sketch of Fabian during their early hero years with Fareeha, David, and Dave. i wanted to portray how far they'd come since being a low-power mage and a brand new hero. the design doesn't hold anymore, but the energy is still there

sky-high.name: making bread
sky-high.description: 'we're doing a good job, right?' 'yeah, we're doing a good job'. a look into Taika's childhood, when David was still there and when her parents were teaching her and Tess how to make bread. a happy moment for the Ngyuens.

sky-high.name: old team teens (1987)
sky-high.description: Fabian and David's team right around when they started getting big. Fareeha still has several inches to grow, and they all ned several costume upgrades. this is an old design for David, but i still think it's cute. you can see how self-determined Fabian is here, already a bit full of themselves.

sky-high.name: old team young adults (2004)
sky-high.description: 'A Team at their Peak? Some of Halcyon’s most beloved heroes reflect on over 15 years of working together and what the future holds.' a look at the old team again, but now as established heroes. this is right before David and Fabian have Taika. this is still an old David design, but I appreciate it. i think this was the first appearance of Fabian's ponytail and i'm still glad i made that decision.

sky-high.name: dancing in the kitchen
sky-high.description: a comic i made a while back, during an angsty part of the campaign. a sort of homage to how much parents still love their kids even when they might disagree. the Nguyens get to love and forgive each other, and have fun together. that's what family is all about.

sky-high.name: Taika early design
sky-high.description: some very very early concept art for Taika, even before i changed her playbook to the Scion. i still think it's pretty cool, but it definitely has a different energy than Taika has now.

sky-high.name: Taika concept art
sky-high.description: some concept art for Taika, trying to figure out what her magic and costume looked like. this was before i decided on circular runes for her magic, and decided not to give her a staff.

sky-high.name: more Taika concept art
sky-high.description: some more concept art for Taika, before i decided i wasn't going to give her a staff, but after deciding that she'd use purple magic to hide her relation to Runesmith.

sky-high.name: Knight Taika
sky-high.description: a sketch of Taika as a Knight. there's a running joke that all of the team members will eventually have Knight forms (which ended up being true). i drew some art to decide what Taika's would look like. I think the halberd is very important.

sky-high.name: Taika and Rhea lookin' cute
sky-high.description: the title says it all. these are two adorable kiddos. really enjoyed coloring this one, it was a lot of fun.

sky-high.name: Taika gets to be happy
sky-high.description: a sketch page from an angsty time in the campaign. i wanted to draw a bunch of scenes where Taika got to be happy. spending time with her parent, hanging out with Rhea, and her team, messing around with Tess. just some fun snapshots.

sky-high.name: Halalcyon
sky-high.description: a drawing of the team all getting food together at their favorite restaurant, Halalcyon.

sky-high.name: Tess early concept
sky-high.description: some early concept art for Tess. now i'm more convinced that Tess has yet to get a costume (or a hero name) and just wears a sweatshirt and a mask, but this was fun to draw.

sky-high.name: Tess is a simp
sky-high.description: Tess and Ana, planning their next villainous activity. or, well, Ana is planning and Tess is.... simping. they're cute.

sky-high.name: a much-needed hug
sky-high.description: from a session in which Tess tries to drive an unfamiliar vehicle and crashes it. Tess commits to never driving again and Taika thanks them for it.

sky-high.name: Taika outfits
sky-high.description: a bunch of outfits for Taika. her normal day-to-day outfit, an alternate street clothes option, a slightly nicer outfit, her gym clothes, a dress for prom, a button-up/skirt combo for prom, and her original costume.

sky-high.name: rivals
sky-high.description: some early art of Taika and Rhea as rivals. there was supposed to be a lot more time spent with them being rivals originally, but neither of them wanted to be mean to their crush.

sky-high.name: Taika idle animation
sky-high.description: an up-close shot of Taika's idle animation, where she draws a magic circle.

sky-high.name: cuties
sky-high.description: sparring got.... interrupted. we'll leave them to it.

sky-high.name: Taika idle animation
sky-high.description: Taika's idle animation. she draws a magic circle.

sky-high.name: Ezra idle animation
sky-high.description: an idle animation of Ezra tapping their foot very fast (they have super speed)

sky-high.name: Lilli idle animation
sky-high.description: Lilli's idle animation, where she blows a gum bubble, stasises it, and then lets it pop.

sky-high.name: Luxin idle animation
sky-high.description: Luxin's idle animation where he turns his hand into a girder and then back again.

sky-high.name: Fabian staff animation
sky-high.description: a quick study of one of Fabian's many staff attacks, where they form a bunch of runes as they put energy into them on the staff, then activating them all at once and launching a beam of energy at the villain.

sky-high.name: Taika gif
sky-high.description: an animation of Taika's early design turning and smiling at the camera
